downloadDescription: Code Sample for WS-Security Interoperability using WSE 2.0 and Systinet Server 5.0 for Java
detailsSection: This article shows Interoperability based on OASIS WS-Security 1.0 between Microsoft WSE 2.0 and Systinet Server for Java 5.0. The walkthroughs in this article will take you through all you need to know to configure the two environments for securely signing and encrypting SOAP requests and responses using X509 certificates.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows XP SP2 or Most Current Version
systemRequirementsSection_supportedOS: Windows Mobile 2002 software for Pocket PCs
Windows Mobile 2003 software for Pocket PCs
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
